name: XYZdris
description:
This is not Tetris. This is XYZdris. It's basically an insanely difficult Tetris-game; in 3D

HOW TO PLAY ON A PC

You navigate using the WASD keys to move the block forward (W), backwards (S), left (A) and right (D). You rotate the camera using the left mouse button. The WASD keys will have their orientation based on the camera direction.

To rotate the blocks, you press the U-key, to rotate on the X-axis, the I-key to rotate on the Y-axis and the O-key to rotate on the Z-axis.

Using the SPACE-key, you can increase the fall-speed of blocks
